author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: اشتعل بنار الحبّ وزیّن بطراز الانقطاع یشتعل بذکره العباد إنّ ربّک لهو العلیم الخبیر طوبی لمن سمع النّدآء وأجاب إنّه من المقرّبین...
translation: If he be kindled with the fire of His love, if he forgoeth all created things, the words he uttereth shall set on fire them that hear him. Verily, thy Lord is the Omniscient, the All-Informed. Happy is the man that hath heard Our voice, and answered Our call. He, in truth, is of them that shall be brought nigh unto Us.
